turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Ashley, can you do me a favor and order me a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I can do that for you. Which Starbucks do you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I prefer the Starbucks across the street from the National Zoo in Washington D.C.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, just to confirm, this is the Starbucks at 3000 Connecticut Ave NW?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is the one

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get an iced mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what size do you want your iced mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll get a tall

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk do you want? They have almond, coconut, nonfat, soy, whole, skim, and 2% milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome! Any toppings that you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What toppings do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can add different flavored syrups like strawberry or chocolate

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'm good without syrups

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what about other toppings like whipped cream or honey?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am good without those, thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! I am ordering your drink now from the Starbucks across of the National Zoo. The baristas said the receipt will show up on your text message

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thank you so much

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, I'll see you soon
